eg.projects

Class ProjectConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • eg.projects.ProjectConfig
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Configurable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    HtmlActions, JavaActions, PerlActions, TxtActions

    public abstract class ProjectConfig
extends java.lang.Object
implements Configurable
    Represents the configuration of a project.

    Class implements methods in Configurable
